channel.title: Alright guys this can be pretty sweet
channel.description:
I DONT KNOW IF THIS IS AGAINST THE RULES, IF IT IS I'LL DELETE THE THREAD IMMEDIATELY (I DONT SEE ANY FORUM RULES SO PLEASE CORRECT ME)
Alright guys theres this new app on the appstore called "bamboo wallet" that you get cash for simple stuff like downloading apps or watching videos, and it's not bs amounts like 2 cents, they give you .50 cents just for download an app. When you invite someone you get $0.50, and when someone signs up using any invite code, they get a $0.25 head start. My idea is that in this thread you use the invite code of the person who posted above you, so we can get some easy invites/profits from this thread. My code is * (enter it when you download and sign up for $0.25 headstart). This isn't bs they even tell you that you get .25 for using an invite code
ONCE AGAIN IF THIS IS AGAINST THE RULES PLEASE TELL ME, I JUST THOUGHT THIS WAS A GOOD IDEA

item.title: Alright guys this can be pretty sweet
